posts.message:
What I like about Edx is the opportunity they offer for everyone- not just to watch - but to be completely involved in the course activies. The nearest thing to a real world class-room experience.

Engineering long lasting software (Software as a service) is my favorite of their offerings. A new round of this course will kick in today
posts.caption: edx.org
posts.description: Software as a ServiceCS169.1x teaches the fundamentals for engineering long-lived software using Agile techniques to develop Software as a Service (SaaS) using Ruby on Rails.ABOUT THIS COURSECS169.1x teaches the fundamentals for engineering long-lasting software using highly-productive Agile techniq...
